Periodically Updates


Hello, I'm Kumar Prasun. Currently, I'm a Junior Research Fellow under Dr. Anil N.
If I had to highlight some of my interests they'll be working on GPU Optimisations, Algorithmic Differentiation & Game Development among other things.

    30/11/2020 Offered position of Junior Research Fellow in the Department of Mathematics at BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus.
    Sponsored by AR&DB - DRDO under the supervision of Dr. Anil N .
    11/09/2020 Graduated from BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus.
    Graduated with degrees in BE Computer Science(Hons) and MSc Mathematics(Hons).
    04/06/2020 Final year undergraduate at BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus.
    Studying for two degrees, BE Computer Science and MSc Mathematics.
    Feel free to mail me any questions or mistakes I've made.
    Also, doing self-revisions of blog posts is a pain.
Research
  1. An Implicitly Parallel Meshfree Solver in Regent. Rupanshu Soi, Nischay Ram Mamidi, Elliott Slaughter, Kumar Prasun, Anil Nemili, and S.M. Deshpande. 2020 IEEE/ACM 3rd Annual Parallel Applications Workshop: Alternatives to MPI+X (PAW-ATM). Virtual Event, November 9 - 19, 2020.
  2. GPU Accelerated Meshfree Solvers for Compressible Flows. Nischay Ram Mamidi, Kumar Prasun, Srikanth C. S., Anil Nemili and S. M. Deshpande. Proceedings of the 21st Annual CFD Symposium, Aeronautical Society of India. Bengaluru, India, August 8 - 9, 2019.
